p: In general, the absolute contents of α-KBA in frankincense was rather low, with a maximum concentration of 1.0 µg per mg oleogum resin. Though, the total content of KBAs of up to 22.3 µg/mg represents an unneglectable part of the oleogum resins. Similarly, the maximum content of α-AKBA was with 2.8 µg/mg rather low, whereas the total amount of AKBAs can reach up to 72.2 µg/mg [ 5].
